name: SEXUAL MANGA ANIME BALLS 2 spermination
detailed_description:
💎💎💎💎💎💎💎💎
SEXUAL MANGA ANIME BALLS 2 spermination - An arcade game inspired by Arkanoid, in which the main task is the destruction of slabs and bricks. The player controls a horizontally moving platform to destroy bricks. With each blow our ball accelerates, each level is more difficult than the previous one. In the game there are improvements to our platform and the deterioration.

The game has many different levels with high complexity (as in the old games). + Especially for you, made a few more additional level in the coop mode.

The game has a very accurate platform! If you like classic kids games, check it out!

Features:
- achievements;
- nice graphics;
- simple mouse control;
- interesting gameplay;
- light music;
- unforgettable adventures;

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:

  • Processor: 1.6 GHz
  • Memory: 256 MB RAM
  • Graphics: Intel HD Graphics
